statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE timestamp < '2021-10-01' AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_reason LIKE '%fraud%' OR detection_time < '2022-02-15';
DELETE FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE detection_algorithm = 'Machine Learning';
DELETE FROM users WHERE registration_date <= '2022-01-01' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM transaction_data WHERE user_id = '87654321-12ab-34cd-56ef-098765432109' AND amount > 1000;
